connectors.description: Imagine you can connect hundreds of API endpoints with one package. flethy is a zero-dependency library that lets you integrate with popular APIs much faster.

flow.heading2: and let the engine do the rest.
flow.description: Go a step further and design flows that make use of the ease of the above explained connectors. Use sequences, parallel and conditional paths and mappings of variables to embed as little as possible in code.

saas.description: If you don't want to run your flows yourself, you can leave it to us. Design, deploy, start! We are currently working on making the product available. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay up to date on this!

endpoints.title: Endpoint
endpoints.generalDescription: Overview of all integrated endpoints for this service. If you're missing an endpoint, please let us know!
